protutils documentation¶

Author:Claude Rogers <cjrogers@caltech.edu>
Source code:github

Description¶

Add a description of the package here.

Dependencies¶

protutils depends on:

numpy
matplotlib
scikit-learn

Installing¶

To build:

$ python setup.py build_ext --inplace
